Title: Long live the socialist mother country!
Designer: Xu Baozhong (许宝中)Cui Yong (崔勇)Zheng Hongliu (郑洪流)Peng Bin (彭彬)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: After the Chinese People's Movement of 1989 was violently crushed, large numbers of posters were published to propagate the restoration of 'peace and order', and the supremacy of the Party and the Army.
